metadata.description:
Brand New Comixology Exclusive Cover!
From the popular TV series from Planet Green, "The Fabulous Beekman Boys," and Martha Stewart's former right hand man, Brent Ridge, comes America's favorite Diva Llama, "Polka Spot." In this new animated comic adventure from Bluewater Productions, the nation's favorite Drama Llama takes over the fashion industry and gets into a heap of fun trouble doing it in a fun all ages, action adventure comedy.
metadata.name: Beekman Boys Present: Polka Spot
